doc:
Thomas F. Wilson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_F._Wilson 0 Thomas Francis Wilson Jr. (born April 15, 1959) is an American actor, voice-over artist, and podcaster best known for playing Biff Tannen, Griff Tannen and Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen in the Back to the Future trilogy and Coach Ben Fredricks on NBC's Freaks and Geeks and for his voice-over work in movies, TV shows and video games. Thomas_Francis_Wilson_Jr. ( born April_15_,_1959 ) is an_American_actor , voice-over_artist , and podcaster best_known for playing Biff_Tannen , Griff_Tannen and Buford " Mad_Dog_"_Tannen in the_Back to the_Future_trilogy and Coach Ben_Fredricks on NBC 's_Freaks_and_Geeks and for his_voice-over_work in movies , TV_shows and video_games .
